<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 3"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Improvised Repair](/Feats.aspx?ID=2132) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 206 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are skilled at making quick fixes to damaged equipment, but your fixes aren't meant to last forever. You make a quick repair to a [broken](/Conditions.aspx?ID=2) non-magical item in your possession. Until the item takes damage again, you can still use it as a [shoddy item](/Rules.aspx?ID=197) of its type. This repair restores no Hit Points, so the item is easy to destroy. Once the item is [Repaired](/Actions.aspx?ID=42) normally such that it is no longer broken, it is also no longer shoddy.
name: Improvised Repair
